templates.description: Spring Boot and Camel QuickStart. This example demonstrates how you can use Apache Camel with Spring Boot on OpenShift. The quickstart uses Spring Boot to configure an application which includes a Camel route that triggers a message every 5th second, and routes the message to a log.
templates.name: s2i-fuse72-spring-boot-camel

templates.description: Spring Boot and Camel Xml QuickStart. This example demonstrates how you can use Apache Camel with Spring Boot on OpenShift. The quickstart uses Spring Boot to configure an application which includes a Camel route (in Spring xml) that triggers a message every 5th second, and routes the message to a log.
templates.name: s2i-fuse72-spring-boot-camel-xml
